data.name: DEEMO -Reborn- OST: Hidden Dreams Edition
data.detailed_description: 《DEEMO -Reborn-》 OST: Hidden Dream Edition compiles 33 songs meticulously crafted by Chamber Chu's group. Lie back and let the piano whisk you away to the world of DEEMO and experience its mysteries once again.
